abstract: Fans of competitive college chess are enjoying their own version of Final Four, known as the President's Cup, at New York Athletic Club; tournament pits top four teams from the annual Pan-American Intercollegiate Team Chess Championship in a round-robin competition.
lead_paragraph: This weekend’s event in New York pits the top four chess teams from December’s Pan-American Intercollegiate Team Chess Championship.

headline.main: Elite Chess Teams Reach Final Four, Which Should Be a Quiet Affair
headline.print_headline: Elite Teams Reach Final Four, Which in This Case Should Be a Quiet Affair

snippet: This weekend’s event in New York pits the top four chess teams from December’s Pan-American Intercollegiate Team Chess Championship.
